title: Kelly Clarkson discography
summary: American singer-songwriter Kelly Clarkson has released nine studio albums, six extended plays, one compilation album, one remix album, and 50 singles (including six as a featured artist). Throughout her career, Clarkson has sold over 25 million albums and 45 million singles worldwide.[1] In 2016, she became the first American Idol contestant with 100 No. 1s across Billboard charts.[2] Billboard ranked her as the 59th top artist of 2010s decade and the 85th greatest artist of all time.[3]
